msgSnippet: Here s the approach we ve taken at Model N.  I have to do some cleanup before I can post the code though.  I think you ll find it interesting at least. Kevin

Here's the approach we've taken at Model N.  I have to do some cleanup
before I can post the code though.  I think you'll find it interesting at
least.
 
Kevin
 

-----Original Message-----
From: Warsa, Steve [mailto:steve.warsa@...]
Sent: Monday, February 05, 2001 6:59 AM
To: 'junit@yahoogroups.com'
Subject: RE: [junit] Test Suites Useless?




-----Original Message-----
From: mrettig@... [mailto:mrettig@...]
Sent: Sunday, February 04, 2001 2:35 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Test Suites Useless?


I'd be very interested in seeing the utility you wrote to find and run all
your test cases.  That would appear to be a handy utility to have.

Could you post it (or a link to it)?  I hate to write something that's
already been written....
